lines: We Immortal Flames fight to protect Ul'dah from all who would threaten her.
Ever do we swear to uphold our oath: for coin and country!
The list of victims falling prey to Amalj'aa thrall-takers grows longer by the day. Our forces in southern Thanalan are stretched thin, and your help is sorely needed.
Forename[GC Rank] Surname, I must thank you once again for avenging my fallen scouts.
Ifrit has ever been an untamable force of destruction, and I feared that the primal's latest incarnation was an inferno beyond anyone's ability to quench. Ul'dah is in your debt.
Your actions in southern Thanalan have done much to restore peace to the region.
Though I would be foolish to think the Amalj'aa cowed for good, this respite gives us the chance to recoup our strength. I will be sure to call upon you again should the need arise.
Once again, allow me to express my thanks, [GC Rank] SurnameForename. Were it not for your efforts, the violence might have continued unabated for some time.
The situation is far from resolved, but I have faith that one day these events will be but a distant memory.
Marshal Tarupin bade me relay this message to you. All knowledge of the incident is being withheld from the public, and things shall remain as they were in Ul'dah...at least on the surface.
You doubtless burn to act─to see justice served. So do we all. However, we must bide our time, for a single misstep could trigger a civil war, and Ul'dah would tear itself apart.
Now that the Flame General has been reinstated to his post, we have regained a semblance of normality.
There is still much and more to be done, but we can finally see a way forward─and we owe it all to you, [GC Rank] SurnameForename.
